H0.text: Who was the first female artist to have a #1 album in the USA and the UK simultaneously. Madonna

H1.text: Who was the first female artist to have a #1 album in the USA and the UK simultaneously. Whitney Houston

H2.text: Who was the first female artist to have a #1 album in the USA and the UK simultaneously. Mariah Carey

H3.text: Who was the first female artist to have a #1 album in the USA and the UK simultaneously. SuBo

A4.text: The album peaked at number 2 in the United Kingdom.

A5.text: In the United States, it peaked at number eight on the Billboard 200

A6.text: Like a Virgin became her first number-one album in the UK and the US.
